name: Blockchain Fundamental Course
discription: This is a series of Blockchain tutorials which is designed specifically for college students. I tried to simplify the course as much as possible so that students understand the tech in a very simple manner.

topics.title: Course overview and onboarding
topics.description: In this video I will provide the overview of course.

topics.title: Web Technology
topics.description: In this video I will talk about Webpage, website and Web technology

topics.title: Client-Server, 3 Tier
topics.description: In this video I will talk about client-server model, 3tier architecture

topics.title: Centralised System
topics.description: In this video I will talk about centralised systems, its advantages and disadvantages.

topics.title: Trust & Problem
topics.description: In this video I will talk about Trust and Problem with trust

topics.title: Peer to Peer Model
topics.description: In this video I will talk about P2P model, how it is different from client-server model? Advantages etc.

topics.title: Decentralised and Distributed Systems
topics.description: In this video I will talk about decentralised systems, distributed systems and their differences - centralised vs decentralised vs distributed

topics.title: What is Blockchain?
topics.description: In this video I will talk about basic of blockchain, what it is? its usecases? its types? etc

topics.title: An Introduction
topics.description: In this video I will talk about fundamental concept of cryptocurrency

topics.title: Wallets
topics.description: In this video I will talk about wallets; Software wallet, hardware wallet, paper wallet, web wallet etc.

topics.title: Lab
topics.description: In this video I will do lab; generate keypair, form transaction, sign transaction, spend;

topics.title: An Introduction
topics.description: In this video I will talk about basic concept of cryptography

topics.title: Hashing
topics.description: In this video I will talk about basic hashing and hash function

topics.title: Symmetric Key Cryptography
topics.description: In this video I will talk about symmetric key cryptography

topics.title: Asymmetric cryptography (Encryption-Decryption)
topics.description: In this video I will talk about Asymmetric key cryptography.

topics.title: Asymmetric cryptography (Digital signature)
topics.description: In this video I will talk about concepts of digital signature.
